body.p:
I have not herdheard from you, onelyonly through the papers in regard to your Health. hope you will have your wish gratifyedgratified & make that visit to California. William is Sick most of the time. we have had the fashionable Complaint. the Gripp. the Boarders in the House not none escaped. I should like to see you
Jennets daughter Clara Boards in the same house with us. John has a Grand Son living with him. he is well as can be expected. did you get totwo Handkerchiefs I sent you Christmas. the resonreason I ask I sent a Fan to Miss Lida Wha she did not get it. a Miss Waters from St Louis called up on us with her Sister. she said was acquainted with your brothers family. her Sister lived in my house at one time, nice family William & I often talk of you
and your Dear mother so kind & good all ways. we feel so sorry that Chicago will have the Fair. many persons will have to pass through New York it will do us somsome good. I got your Picture on Broadway near 28 st for my Friend Mrs Edward Smith the head of the Clothing Firm of Smith Gray her Sons carycarry on the business. she writes somsome potrypoetry for her friends I have two Books. I must close to go to lunch.

closer.salute: wishing you much love from your Cousin
